name: The Cabin in the Woodn't
description:
"After all these years, I am standing again in this yard, the smell of snowy mud and elder pines permeating my nose. My childhood cabin, so different and yet so identical, brings back memories. But not necessarily good ones.

I didn't want to come back here, however the two trees arching just before the cabin's porch are making me feel like home. I cannot recall them being there when I was a child, but they might have been mere sprouts back then.

Maybe I should quit stalling the inevitable and go in."

"The Cabin in the Woodn't" is a horror text-adventure where the player returns after many years to an old cabin, built long ago by their parents in the woods. Without deviating from the cliché at ALL, the protagonist soon discovers the cabin is slightly cursed, and now hosts an unexpected visitor.

The game was created during the Global Game Jam [Athens] 2023 with the theme "Roots", by the "Puns Labyrith" team :

 Christina Chrysanthopoulou - Art, Narrative, Writing, Design

Paris Laras - Content, Design

Kostas Cheliotis - Programming, Design

Music by Dream-Protocol, downloaded from pixabay.com
